### 介绍
作者：李钰昕

### 代码
```{r}
Drink <- function(x1, x2) {
  s1 <- 7
  s2 <- 8
  s3 <- 9
  x <- x1 + x2
  if(x < s1)
    "you are lucky! You needn’t do anything!"
  else if(x < s2)
    "Add some wine in the cup as you like please!"
  else if(x < s3)
    "Drink half wine in the cup please!"
  else
    "Drink all wine in the cup please!"
}
```

### 演示
```{r}
x1 <- c(1:6)
x2 <- c(1:6)
Drink(1,2)
Drink(3,4)
Drink(3,5)
Drink(4,5)
Drink(2,6)
Drink(4,6)
Drink(1,4)
```
